title: PLEASE HELP ME League will not open please help
body: i run league as administrater and then i select yes and then nothing not even the league logo loads please give me a solution PLEASE HELP!!!

replies.body: I've tried those all of them multiple times each and nothing works
ok i just tried the patching issues solution that did not work :'(

Same thing happened to me made a riot support ticket and no response for almost 3 days now I've tried everything. When I uninstall and reinstall my game same with happens to me
Also I'm getting this error : https://gyazo.com/001acc91f76030aafa5a1e634490003c

Your screenshot indicates you might have a similar situation where your OS settings are preventing your league folder from being accessed.  Our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide should get you fixed up.  I hope that helps!

It sounds like your patcher is unable to launch due to a permissions issue with your OS.  Running as administrator is a great first step, but there are a few more things we can try.  Go over our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide for more coverage towards getting this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any issues!
i was playing like 2 hours ago
